CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1957, page B6, reads: "Loblaws Ambassadors - Several weeks ago the top-flight cashiers, now at Loblaws' new supermarket were photographed while undergoing an intensive 'Goodwill Ambassador's course at the company's downtown training school, supervised by Mrs. Ruth Donahue, third from left."
TitMainTitle: Seven women, including Sarah Haywood third from right, Janice Finney far right, and Ruth Donahue center, pointing to sign reading "You are Loblaws as far as the customer is concerned" in interior with chalkboard
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Grocery stores--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Loblaws Grocery (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Workers--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Donahue, Ruth.Finney, Janice.Haywood, Sarah.
